name: music-player-desktop
description: Offline-first music player with YouTube download capability
author: Music Player

scripts.package: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.package:mac: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.package:win: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.package:linux: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.package:all: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder -mwl --publish never
scripts.publish: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:backend && electron-builder --publish always
